definition[0]: a large amount of money, property etc that a person or country owns
example[0]: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
example[1]: the distribution of wealth  (=the way wealth is divided among the people of a country or society)
example[2]: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
definition[1]: a large amount of money or valuable possessions
example[3]: Colombia’s economy needn’t rely solely on its mineral wealth.
example[4]: The legislation is designed to give American firms the ability togenerate wealth from overseas operations.
